replies.body:
@Cole Thank you! Pop told me you had the same birthday and I now realized Aero has it too! My brother's friend and my friend's brothers birthdays are also today, haha. :)

@Glimps Thanks a bunch! And no, I don't even eat bacon, haha. :) I have chicken, though!

@Majesty Thanks! Why wouldn't I?! :D
